title: Pen & Paper
description:
On episode 310 of Sleep & Relax ASMR, we hear the soothing sounds of a pen writing on paper. The audio clip is edited to create a more seamless audio experience. Enjoy!

Listen on Radio Public: https://radiopublic.com/sleep-and-relax-asmr-6pAPm8
